changeSet.sql:
create table operation ( id bigint primary key, name text not null, type text not null, status text not null, error text, started_at timestamp with time zone not null, ended_at timestamp with time zone, description text,
version integer, created_at timestamp with time zone, created_by text, updated_at timestamp with time zone, updated_by text );

changeSet.author: emiliano
emiliano
changeSet.sql:
create table completion ( id bigint primary key, transcription_id bigint references transcription (id) not null, input text not null, output text, input_tokens integer, output_tokens integer, model text, temperature double precision, top_p double precision, status text not null, duration interval, error text,
version integer, created_at timestamp with time zone, created_by text, updated_at timestamp with time zone, updated_by text ); create index completion_transcription_id_index on completion (transcription_id);

changeSet.author: emiliano
changeSet.sql:
create table settings ( id bigint primary key, key text not null unique, name text not null, value jsonb not null,
version integer, created_at timestamp with time zone, created_by text, updated_at timestamp with time zone, updated_by text ); create index settings_key_index on settings (key);

changeSet.author: emiliano
changeSet.sql:
create table template ( id bigint primary key, name text not null unique, content text not null,
version integer, created_at timestamp with time zone, created_by text, updated_at timestamp with time zone, updated_by text ); create index template_name_index on template (name);

changeSet.author: emiliano
changeSet.sql:
create table transcription_word ( id bigint primary key, transcription_id bigint references transcription (id) not null, speaker_name text not null, start_offset_millis bigint not null, end_offset_millis bigint not null, content text not null, sequence integer,
version integer, created_at timestamp with time zone, created_by text, updated_at timestamp with time zone, updated_by text ); create index transcription_word_transcription_id_index on transcription_word (transcription_id); create index transcription_word_sequence_index on transcription_word (sequence);
